EmailTemplate.subject: Great to See You in Paris
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Guest}}, It was a great pleasure to meet with you at the Paris Air Show last week, we hope the event was a great success for you. We want to be sure we can keep in touch and share all our latest news, offers and invitations with you in the future. Please sign up to make sure you do not miss out on our latest news. Registration is quick and easy and can be completed here.
CLICK HERE TO REGISTER <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
Kind regards, The Honeywell Team
